name: Sugar Hop
description:
Sugar Hop is a game inspired by the easy to play but hard to accomplish games out there in the market. In this game you play as a Sugar Cube that with no reason appeared in the middle of the ocean, his biggest enemy (literally). Your challenge will be to travel as long as you can, get the best distance among your friends and archive the maximum rank.

 

Instructions:

Move with A/D/W or the Arrow Keys (You can't move back).
